hanzi-su-wiki:
雄

Значения

Самец; сильный, смелый

Мнемоника

Справа — «рука» в двух разных написаниях. Птичий 隹 самец, любящий «поработать кулаками».
purpleculture_pinyin:
xióng
male; staminate; grand; imposing; powerful; mighty; person or state having great power and influence
мужчина; тычиночный; великий; внушительный; мощный; могущественный; лицо или государство, обладающее большой властью и влиянием

heisig_chinese_memo: Men walk with their elbows out from their sides in a weird turkey trot when they try to appear very grand and masculine. Think of a 70's pimp walk.
heisig_constituent: masculine, Yamanote, by one’s side, elbow, turkey
heisig_story: By one's side . . . elbow . . . turkey. Its match is in frame 605.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: masculine, male, hero, leader, superiority, excellence
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: мужской, мужской, герой, лидер, превосходство, превосходство
koohiiStory1: Men walk with their elbows out from their sides in a weird turkey trot when they try to appear very MASCULINE. Think of a 70´s pimp walk.
koohiiStory2: Masculine duties are to offer your elbow to the lady by your left side and to cut the turkey on special meals.
jp_example_words:
英雄(えいゆう): hero, great man
雄(おす): male (animal)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The narwhal and the turkey are meeting in private to uh, show each other some private things. Doing this they realize they're both male!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a male narwhal and a male turkey meeting together in private. Whispering. Giggling. Pointing at each other's male bits.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: These male animals are obviously experimenting with things still. Ah, they must be youths (ゆう)! To be a youth, again!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's just nature. Youths like to learn and try new things. And if two male youth animals wanna get together in private that's their business.
Ru_Meaning: masculine, male, hero, leader, superiority, excellence
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ノ, 厶 (значок МУ), 隹 (старая птица)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Men walk with their elbows out from their sides in a weird turkey trot when they try to appear very grand and masculine. Think of a 70's pimp walk.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "隹" and "厷", the original meaning is male bird. "Shuowen": "Father Bird. From the 隹, scream." "Poetry‧Beifeng‧Xiong's Pheasant": "The male pheasant flies, let out its feathers."

" Male " can generally refer to plants and animals that can produce sperm cells, namely males. "Poetry‧Qifeng‧Nanshan": "Nanshan Cui Cui, the male fox Suisui."

" Male " can specifically refer to men. "Zhuangzi·De Chongfu": "(Sorrow for it) to horrify the world with evil, and not to sing. It does not know that there are four areas, and if there are males and females that match the former, there must be people who are different." Chen Guying Today's note: "Male and female, refers to the woman's husband."

" Xiong " also refers to the strong and outstanding. "Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "Qi Zhuanggong Dynasty, referring to Shuchuo and Guo Zui said: "I am a widowed male.""

" Xiong " can mean dominating the roost. "Warring States Policy‧Zhao Cesan": "Fang Jin is the only world under Qin Xiong."

" Male " is also a metaphor for being strong and winning, and is often used with " female ". "Historical Records-The Benji of Xiang Yu": "I am willing to challenge the Han King to fight the male and female."

" Xiong " also means bravery. "Mozi: Self-cultivation": "Those who do not cultivate will be lazy afterwards." Sun Yirang Xianyi quoted Bi Yuan and said: "The hero is brave."

" Xiong " also describes a person who is majestic, majestic, and the place is majestic and dangerous. "Northern History-Lu Cao Biography": "Cao's body is nine feet long, his sideburns are very majestic, his arm hair is inverted like a pig hyena, and he can pull trees." Song Luyou "Notes to Lao Xue'an" Volume 10: "His tomb is in the Qiantang River For water, the case of Qin Wangshan in Yue is majestic."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "隹" and "厷", the original meaning is male bird.
humanum_full_description:
從「隹」，「厷」聲，本義為公鳥。《說文》：「鳥父也。从隹，厷聲。」 《詩‧邶風‧雄雉》：「雄雉于飛，泄泄其羽。」

　　「雄」可泛指動植物能產生精細胞的，即雄性。《詩‧齊風‧南山》：「南山崔崔，雄狐綏綏。」

　　「雄」可特指男子。《莊子‧德充符》：「（哀駘它）又以惡駭天下，和而不唱，知不出乎四域，且有雌雄合乎前，是必有異乎人者也。」陳鼓應今注：「雌雄，指婦人丈夫。」

　　「雄」也指強有力者、傑出者。《左傳‧襄公二十一年》：「齊莊公朝，指殖綽、郭最曰：『是寡人之雄也。』」

　　「雄」可表示稱雄。《戰國策‧趙策三》：「方今唯秦雄天下。」

　　「雄」也比喻高強、勝利，常與「雌」連用。《史記‧項羽本紀》：「願與漢王挑戰決雌雄。」

　　「雄」亦表示勇武。《墨子‧修身》：「雄而不脩者，其後必惰。」孫詒讓閒詁引畢沅曰：「雄猶勇。」

　　「雄」還形容人雄壯、雄偉及地方雄奇、險要。《北史‧盧曹傳》：「曹身長九尺，鬢面甚雄，臂毛逆如豬鬣，力能拔樹。」 宋陸游《老學庵筆記》卷十：「其墓以錢塘江為水，越之秦望山為案，可謂雄矣。」

從「 隹 」，「 厷 」聲，本義為公鳥。《說文》：「鳥父也。从隹，厷聲。」 《詩‧邶風‧雄雉》：「雄雉于飛，泄泄其羽。」 「 雄 」可泛指動植物能產生精細胞的，即雄性。《詩‧齊風‧南山》：「南山崔崔，雄狐綏綏。」 「 雄 」可特指男子。《莊子‧德充符》：「（哀駘它）又以惡駭天下，和而不唱，知不出乎四域，且有雌雄合乎前，是必有異乎人者也。」陳鼓應今注：「雌雄，指婦人丈夫。」 「 雄 」也指強有力者、傑出者。《左傳‧襄公二十一年》：「齊莊公朝，指殖綽、郭最曰：『是寡人之雄也。』」 「 雄 」可表示稱雄。《戰國策‧趙策三》：「方今唯秦雄天下。」 「 雄 」也比喻高強、勝利，常與「 雌 」連用。《史記‧項羽本紀》：「願與漢王挑戰決雌雄。」 「 雄 」亦表示勇武。《墨子‧修身》：「雄而不脩者，其後必惰。」孫詒讓閒詁引畢沅曰：「雄猶勇。」 「 雄 」還形容人雄壯、雄偉及地方雄奇、險要。《北史‧盧曹傳》：「曹身長九尺，鬢面甚雄，臂毛逆如豬鬣，力能拔樹。」 宋陸游《老學庵筆記》卷十：「其墓以錢塘江為水，越之秦望山為案，可謂雄矣。」
From the sound of " 隹" and " 厷", the original meaning is male bird. "Shuowen": "Father Bird. From the 隹, scream." "Poetry‧Beifeng‧Xiong's Pheasant": "The male pheasant flies, let out its feathers." " Male" can generally refer to plants and animals that can produce sperm cells, namely males. "Poetry‧Qifeng‧Nanshan": "Nanshan Cui Cui, the male fox Suisui." " Male" can specifically refer to men. "Zhuangzi·De Chongfu": "(Sorrow for it) to horrify the world with evil, and not to sing. It does not know that there are four areas, and if there are males and females that match the former, there must be people who are different." Chen Guying Today's note: "Male and female, refers to the woman's husband." " Xiong" also refers to the strong and outstanding. "Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "Qi Zhuanggong Dynasty, referring to Shuchuo and Guo Zui said: "I am a widowed male."" " Xiong" can mean dominating the roost. "Warring States Policy‧Zhao Cesan": "Fang Jin is the only world under Qin Xiong." " Male" is also a metaphor for being strong and winning, and is often used with " female". "Historical Records-The Benji of Xiang Yu": "I am willing to challenge the Han King to fight the male and female." " Xiong" also means bravery. "Mozi: Self-cultivation": "Those who do not cultivate will be lazy afterwards." Sun Yirang Xianyi quoted Bi Yuan and said: "The hero is brave." " Xiong" also describes a person who is majestic, majestic, and the place is majestic and dangerous. "Northern History-Lu Cao Biography": "Cao's body is nine feet long, his sideburns are very majestic, his arm hair is inverted like a pig hyena, and he can pull trees." Song Luyou "Notes to Lao Xue'an" Volume 10: "His tomb is in the Qiantang River For water, the case of Qin Wangshan in Yue is majestic."

雄字的基本解释

雄
xióng
阳性的，与“雌”相对：雄性。雄鸡。雄狮。雄蕊。雄蜂。
强有力的：雄壮。雄健。雄伟。雄厚。雄浑。雄劲。雄奇。雄踞。雄视。雄姿。雄心。雄关。雄图。雄辩。雄才大略。
强有力的人或国家：雄杰（ａ．才能出众的人；ｂ．才能出众）。雄俊。英雄。枭雄。奸雄。称雄。
雌

雄字的起名意思

：指与“雌”相对；强有力的，杰出的，俗语有“雄才大略”。

male
Basic explanation of words
male
xióng
Positive, as opposed to "female": male. rooster. Lion. Stamens. Drone.
Powerful: majestic. Majestic. majestic. Solid. Majestic. Majestic. Majestic. Dominate. Xiongshi. Majestic. Ambition. Xiongguan. Male figure. eloquent. Xiongcai roughly.
A powerful person or country: a hero (a. an outstanding person; b. an outstanding person). Xiongjun. hero. Syndicate. Traitorous. rule the roost.
female
male

male
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
male
Source glyph
male
Name meaning
: Refers to the opposite of "female"; powerful and outstanding, as the saying goes, "male talents are rough."
xióng
I сущ.
1) петух; самец (птиц, животных); мужская особь (растений); мужской
雄鸡 петух
雄细胞 биол. мужская клетка
2) вожак, главарь; предводитель; заправила; силач, сильнейший
七雄 ист. семь сильнейших княжеств (эпохи Чжаньго)
称雄 считаться сильнейшим
3) храбрец, герой
世雄也! вот это герой!
4) преимущество, перевес в силах; победитель
决雌雄 определять победителя; решать исход состязания (сражения, спора)
II прил. /наречие
1) один (первый) из пары; главный, сильнейший, важнейший; крупный, большой
雄柱 главный (крайний) зуб гребня
雄擅 крепко держать в своей власти
2) храбрый, мужественный; геройский; воинственный; высокомерный, заносчивый
雄兵 xpабрый воин; сильное войско
3) умный; талантливый, способный; сильный; яркий
雄作 талантливое произведение
雄将 способный (храбрый) полководец
III гл.
* обладать властью (превосходством) над...; крепко держать в руках; верховодить; господствовать над...
拿话雄人 показывать своё превосходство над людьми
雄百代 господствовать над умами в течение многих поколений
IV словообр.
образует названия животных и растений мужского пола
雄鹿 олень-самец
雄鹅 гусак
雄麻 мужская особь конопли, посконь
V собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 雄县) Сюнсянь (уезд в пров. Хэбэй)
2) Сюн (фамилия)
Radicals: ナ, ム, 隹  (narwhal, private, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
The narwhal and the turkey are meeting in private to uh, show each other some private things. Doing this they realize they're both male!
Picture a male narwhal and a male turkey meeting together in private. Whispering. Giggling. Pointing at each other's male bits.
Reading Mnemonic
These male animals are obviously experimenting with things still. Ah, they must be youths (ゆう)! To be a youth, again!
It's just nature. Youths like to learn and try new things. And if two male youth animals wanna get together in private that's their business.
